comments:
Linux - GTK
Hyades 3.0
NOTE: Only occurs on GTK, not in Motif.

When I try to attach to a local agent for the first time, and hit OK on the 
LCD. The Profiling Monitor view does not get updated, and the following error 
appears:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access

Note: When I attach to another agent, then both of the agents appear in the 
Profling Montior. Seems this only happens the first time I try to attach.
Which Hyades build are you using?
Does not occur in latest build 3.0_20040319_0934.
